entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of snow. Local blowing snow. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
